articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
articles.title: Porsche’s insanely clever hybrid engine comes to the 911 Turbo S - Ars Technica
articles.description: The new 911 variant is 14 seconds quicker around the Nürburgring Nordschleife.

articles.title: Carlo Acutis: From London baptism to first millennial saint - BBC
articles.description: Before his death at 15, Carlo Acutis was known for his love of technology and had created a website to document miracles.
articles.content:
Thousands attend canonisation of teenager Carlo Acutis, the first millennial saint
A London-born boy has become the first millennial saint, in a ceremony steeped in an ancient ritual presided over b… [+3424 chars]
